item.title: Disambiguation pages to work with Reaper Blood States
item.content:encoded:
One of the item scripts links to:
items:bankai-driving-gloves and items:shikai-driving-gloves
and I imagine the cobra kai as well.

Can we make redirect pages with those urls and have them redirect to items:reaper-driving-gloves ??

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Shikai +20% -2 All Levels +2 Dou Strength

Reaper Blood: Shikai gives -2 Levels, +2 G/N/T Strength.
Reaper Gloves: Shikai gives +20% Tips, -2 Levels, +2 Dou Strength.
Pretty useless unless you're way over-levelled and you really need dou strength.

In other words, being in Reaper Blood: Dormant is the best state you can be in with the gloves, not just for the extra 10% tips, but the fact it lacks a negative altogether.

item.content:encoded:
Yeah, but do the effects of the Reaper Blood perm and the Reaper Gloves perm stack? As in, Shikai giving overall -4 GNT levels, -2 D levels and +2 All strength? Or rather -2 all levels and +2 all strength?
I thought it would be the later, but then I saw that the penalty listed for Cobra Kai is different.

Oh.

Well, the "Reaper Blood: <Blahblah>" Perm doesn't change. Only the Gloves do.

item.content:encoded: I was actually asking about the same blood state. Bankai before and after Reaper Driving Gloves.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: No. In the same way that each Blood State is a different Perm, each Glove is a different item, so the stats just get switched.

item.content:encoded:
Is the new cost of blood state additive to the original one?
For example, Bankai:
- original : -1 G/N/T Strength cost, +5 G/N/T levels reward.
- new non-additive : -1 G/N/T/D Strength cost, +5 G/N/T levels +4 D levels reward.
- new additive : -2 G/N/T strength -1 D strength cost, +5 G/N/T levels +4 D levels reward.
